Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the containerized application, including resource needs, scalability, and security requirements.
Design the architecture for the containerized application, including the use of Azure App Service, container registry, and networking components.
Build and test the container image locally. Ensure the image meets application requirements and is optimized for performance.

Tasks.Task: Push Container Image to Azure Container Registry
Tasks.Task Description: Upload the container image to Azure Container Registry for deployment. Ensure proper tagging and versioning of the image.
Provision a Web App for Containers in the Azure portal. Specify the container image and configure basic settings such as resource group and region.
Set up environment variables, connection strings, and other application settings required for the containerized application.
Enable security features such as HTTPS, Azure Active Directory authentication, and access restrictions. Configure firewall rules and secure application secrets.
Configure monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and Application Insights. Set up alerts for performance metrics and error logs.
Deploy the containerized application and perform thorough testing to ensure functionality, performance, and security requirements are met.
Analyze application performance and optimize resource allocation, scaling settings, and container configurations.
Create detailed documentation for the application setup, configurations, and operational procedures. Share with the operations team.
Provide training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the Web App for Containers setup.
Set up backup and recovery mechanisms for the containerized application, including regular backups and failover strategies.
Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with security and operational standards. Review logs and configurations periodically.
Set up continuous monitoring for application performance, availability, and security using Azure Monitor and Application Insights.
